REGISTER TO COMPETE.

[/et_pb_text][/et_pb_column][/et_pb_row][et_pb_row _builder_version=”3.3.1″][et_pb_column type=”4_4″ _builder_version=”3.3.1″ parallax=”off” parallax_method=”on”][et_pb_text _builder_version=”3.3.1″ text_font=”||||||||” text_text_color=”#ffffff” text_orientation=”center”]

Early registration fee is $125 and ends on June 1st. The registration fee on June 2nd will be $150. There will be no late registration at the event site on June 3rd.

[/et_pb_text][/et_pb_column][/et_pb_row][/et_pb_section][et_pb_section fb_built=”1″ _builder_version=”3.3.1″ background_color=”#f4f4f4″ custom_margin=”-1px|||”][et_pb_row custom_padding=”27px|0px|0|0px|false|false” _builder_version=”3.2″ background_color=”#ffffff” border_radii=”on|5px|5px|5px|5px” box_shadow_style=”preset3″][et_pb_column type=”4_4″ _builder_version=”3.2″ parallax=”off” parallax_method=”on”][et_pb_text _builder_version=”3.2″ custom_margin=”|||20px”]

Please fill in all of your information.

Due to new COVID 19 County Guidelines, ALL RIDERS must provide a valid Address to be able to be contacted after the event.

[/et_pb_text][et_pb_text _builder_version=”3.3.1″][/et_pb_text][et_pb_code _builder_version=”3.3.1″ custom_margin=”20px|20px|20px|20px”][/et_pb_code][/et_pb_column][/et_pb_row][/et_pb_section][et_pb_section fb_built=”1″ custom_padding_last_edited=”on|phone” prev_background_color=”#f4f4f4″ next_background_color=”#334049″ admin_label=”Why Choose Us Section” _builder_version=”3.3.1″ background_color=”#bababa” use_background_color_gradient=”on” background_color_gradient_start=”#9cadba” background_color_gradient_end=”#f7fbff” background_color_gradient_direction=”234deg” custom_padding=”43px|0px|82px|0px|false|false” custom_padding_phone=”||25px|” top_divider_style=”asymmetric4″ top_divider_height=”37px” bottom_divider_style=”asymmetric4″ bottom_divider_height=”27px”][et_pb_row custom_padding=”29px||0px||false|false” _builder_version=”3.2″ custom_margin_phone=”||0px|” custom_margin_last_edited=”on|phone”][et_pb_column type=”4_4″ _builder_version=”3.2″ parallax=”off” parallax_method=”on”][et_pb_text _builder_version=”3.2″ text_font=”||||||||” header_font=”||||||||” header_font_size=”34px” header_2_font=”Poppins|700||on|||||” header_2_text_color=”rgba(0,0,0,0.2)” header_2_font_size=”34px” header_2_letter_spacing=”1px” header_2_line_height=”1.3em” text_orientation=”center” custom_margin=”||0px|” saved_tabs=”all” locked=”off”]

DISCIPLINES

[/et_pb_text][/et_pb_column][/et_pb_row][et_pb_row custom_padding=”31px||0||false|false” custom_padding_last_edited=”on|phone” _builder_version=”3.2″ custom_margin_phone=”-50px|||” custom_margin_last_edited=”on|phone”][et_pb_column type=”1_3″ _builder_version=”3.2″ parallax=”off” parallax_method=”on”][et_pb_blurb title=”RACE” image=”https://mauikitefest.com/wp-content/uploads/2018/04/2017KB_ActionPhotos_1440x810_Mutant_A.jpg” _builder_version=”3.3.1″ header_font=”|800|||||||” header_text_align=”center” background_color=”#ffffff” border_radii=”on|5px|5px|5px|5px” border_width_all=”10px” border_color_all=”#ffffff” box_shadow_style=”preset3″ animation=”off”]

Endurance and speed can win you this one! Whoever is the fastest will surely be number one unless you get taken out!

[/et_pb_blurb][/et_pb_column][et_pb_column type=”1_3″ _builder_version=”3.2″ parallax=”off” parallax_method=”on”][et_pb_blurb title=”WOMEN’S FREESTYLE” image=”https://mauikitefest.com/wp-content/uploads/2018/04/Womens-freestyle.png” _builder_version=”3.3.1″ header_font=”|800|||||||” header_text_align=”center” background_color=”#ffffff” border_radii=”on|5px|5px|5px|5px” border_width_all=”10px” border_color_all=”#ffffff” box_shadow_style=”preset3″ animation=”off”]

In this one, we want to see the women that can throw down the dopest tricks. Technical, big, and aggressive can win this one.

[/et_pb_blurb][/et_pb_column][et_pb_column type=”1_3″ _builder_version=”3.2″ parallax=”off” parallax_method=”on”][et_pb_blurb title=”GROM FREESTYLE” image=”https://mauikitefest.com/wp-content/uploads/2018/04/Grom-freestyle.png” _builder_version=”3.2″ header_font=”|800|||||||” header_text_align=”center” background_color=”#ffffff” border_radii=”on|5px|5px|5px|5px” border_width_all=”10px” border_color_all=”#ffffff” box_shadow_style=”preset3″ animation=”off”]

Love to do tricks? Freestyle is for those that like to do wake style tricks, are good at unhooking, and are technical riders.

[/et_pb_blurb][/et_pb_column][/et_pb_row][et_pb_row custom_padding=”27px|0px|26.734375px|0px|false|false” custom_padding_phone=”26px|||” custom_padding_last_edited=”on|phone” _builder_version=”3.2″][et_pb_column type=”1_3″ _builder_version=”3.2″ parallax=”off” parallax_method=”on”][et_pb_blurb title=”WING” image=”https://mauikitefest.com/wp-content/uploads/2020/02/Screen-Shot-2020-02-03-at-11.50.37-AM.jpg” _builder_version=”3.3.1″ header_font=”|800|||||||” header_text_align=”center” background_color=”#ffffff” border_radii=”on|5px|5px|5px|5px” border_width_all=”10px” border_color_all=”#ffffff” box_shadow_style=”preset3″ animation=”off”]

Racing and Freestyle. Show off your best tricks and how fast you can ride.

[/et_pb_blurb][/et_pb_column][et_pb_column type=”1_3″ _builder_version=”3.2″ parallax=”off” parallax_method=”on”][/et_pb_column][et_pb_column type=”1_3″ _builder_version=”3.2″ parallax=”off” parallax_method=”on”][/et_pb_column][/et_pb_row][/et_pb_section][et_pb_section fb_built=”1″ admin_label=”Our Classes Section” _builder_version=”3.3.1″ background_color=”#334049″ custom_padding=”61px|0px|90px|0px|false|false” global_module=”376″ saved_tabs=”all”][et_pb_row custom_padding=”27px|0px|0|0px|false|false” _builder_version=”3.2″][et_pb_column type=”4_4″ _builder_version=”3.0.47″ parallax=”off” parallax_method=”on”][et_pb_text _builder_version=”3.2″ custom_margin=”||10px|”]
